name: Salomon 2020 QST 92 Skis - Unisex
description: All the fun of a backside ski in a frontside package. Salomon’s freeski DNA runs through the QST 92, making it an all-mountain monster ready to tackle it all. Stable with some pop, the ski adds confidence at speed. The sidecut is focused for power and edge grip while its rubber edging smooths the ride and improves contact with the snow. A Koroyd tip cuts through chatter but keeps you in control, on piste or off.Internally milled poplar wood core offers great stability and rebound.Ti Power Platform underfoot offers great edging on hard snow.C/FX carbon and basalt keeps the weight low while increasing the ski's dampness and edge grip.All-Terrain Rocker offers a mix of precision and manoeuvrability.Sandwich construction features ABS sidewall all around the ski for increase durability and strength.5-point sidecut improves steering in mixed snow and feels quick and agile.Cork tip and tail are lightweight and reduce vibration without sacrificing control.
